content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that the pattern of inefficiencies being overlooked is due to differing priorities and potential systemic barriers within the organization. The next step is to conduct a thorough analysis of the decision-making processes and information flow within the organization. I will also engage in conversations with key stakeholders to understand their priorities and constraints, aiming to align my observations with their goals and address any barriers they face.

metadata.trigger: What pattern do I keep seeing that others might be missing?
